casebody.data:
In re L.G. 2017-0877 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Marsha L. Levick. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
